name: A Mental Mouse
description:
A Mental Mouse is on a rampage! Guide him through vibrant and challenging levels as he wreaks havoc!

Balance the crazy biker mouse as he rides over cheese, hamburgers and other household obstacles. TILT your device or use the specially designed SLIDER system to reach the finish line as soon as possible.

Who says mice can't ride dirt-bikes?

★ FEATURES ★

- Real-time biking engine.

- Two ways to bike - Tilt your device or use the specially designed Slider system.

- 40 fruit-full levels!

- FULL HD RETINA graphics.


★ SUPPORTS ALL DEVICES ★
Supports iOS 3.0 and above.
Supports iPhone 2G / 3G / 3GS / 4 and newer, iPod 1st/ 2nd / 3rd and 4th generation and newer.
Supports iPad and iPad 2 (in emulation x2 mode).

★ UPDATES ★
v1.1
✓ Game center leaderboards.
✓ New Garden Pack (20 NEW LEVELS!)

v1.2
✓ Fix for Garden Pack textures on older devices.

v1.3
✓ Improved performance on older devices - smoother engine!
✓ Bug fixes.

v1.4
✓ Difficult "Knives" adjusted on Level 19.
✓ Fixed volume slider.
✓ Other minor bug fixes.
